item.title: Sony Re-Releasing Salma Hayek-Debut Pic ‘Midaq Alley’ Which Closes San Sebastian’s Classics Section (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: “Midaq Alley” (“El Callejón de los Milagros”), the Jorge Fons 1995 gem that launched Salma Hayek’s career, is being re-released by Sony Pictures across Mexico and Latin America, thanks to an agreement
